item.title: SiSoftware Sandra 20/21-R26 â€“ More Updates and Fixes
item.dc:creator: Adrian Silasi
item.description: We are pleased to release R26 (version 31.137 update for Sandra 20/21 with updated support for current and future hardware. Hardware Support Resolved detection issues with Intel’s 14th Gen Core RaptorLake-Refresh (e.g. 14700K(F)) Resolved reporting issues with AMD’s Gen4 Ryzen (e.g. 7950X-3D) Software Support Resolved detection issues with tiered Storage â€¦ Read more... →
